item.title: CVE-2024-31356|2024-04-10T16:19:56.037Z -- Solwin Infotech -- User Activity Log
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Solwin Infotech User Activity Log.This issue affects User Activity Log: from n/a through 1.8.
